questions.question: Set in the sky atop giant clouds, this arc features a battle against the 'God' of Skypiea, Enel, and the discovery of an ancient bell. What is...?
Taking place on a ship graveyard, this arc introduces the character of Brook and the concept of the Florian Triangle. What is...?
Taking place on a mysterious, moving island, this arc introduces the Mink Tribe and reveals new information about the world. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows the user to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This technique, used by a Straw Hat crew member, involves transforming into a heavier, more powerful form. What is...?
This lesser-known member of the Revolutionary Army is recognized for his ability to create powerful winds and for being the second-in-command to Monkey D. Dragon. Who is...?
Known for his 'Fire Fist' attack, this character is the sworn brother of the Straw Hat Pirates' captain and had the Flame-Flame Fruit. Who is...?
This character is known for their alias 'O-Nami' and their ability to manipulate weather, often seen with a weapon called the 'Clima-Tact'. Who is...?
